word: \n     The invitation is given to all, \"Come unto Me, all [no one is excluded] ye that labour, and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.\" \"Ho, every one that thirsteth, come ye to the waters; and he that hath no money, come ye, buy, and eat; yea, come, buy wine and milk without money and without price.\" \"And the Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him that heareth say, Come. And let him that is athirst come. And whosoever will, let him take the water of life freely.\" Jesus adds, \"Him that cometh unto Me, I will in no wise cast out.\"
